text: Arra wa fushin-sha no tame ni jitsurei o shimesa reru. Nufu no tsuma, soshite ruto no tsumadearu. Kare-ra ryonin wa, 2-ri no tadashi waga shimo be no moto ni ita. Ka no on'na-tachi wa, kare-ra (otto) ni taishite fuseijitsude, arra no omoto de nanra eru tokoro wa nakatta. Soshite `anata gata 2-ri wa (soto no) hairu mono to issho ni hi goku ni ire.' To tsuge rareta
